text: 5:9-10 Hibru 2:10; 5:6; 11:40Egha a uan ingangarir a damuamiba, a bar da gɨfa. Ezɨ God anemɨsevegha ghaze, “Nɨ Ofa Gamir Gumazibar Dapanimɨn ikiam, egh Melkisedekɨn mɨn ikiam.” Ezɨ a gumazamizir an akam baragha an gɨn zuiba, a men Akurvazir Gumazimɨn oto. Egh a men akurvaghtɨ me deravɨra ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
